The pre-dinner Cocktail Party was hosted by ^ohn Wall for G.E.-
they make good TV sets and good drinks I
lerry Sandler flew up from Washington with John Witherspoon,
fellow Ner man...no plane, just greased their armpits.1
Those who flew in by l4ohawk discovered how it's done so cheaply-
-no airports! They drop you where
you want to land and two stewardesses
on the ground catch you in a blanket!
The distaff side was more in evi¬
dence than is customary at our meetings.
A1 Fredette, Albany radio man, and Bon
Schein, Schenectady TV tycoon, both
agreed this might be the beginning of
a healthy trend.
